item.title: x86 Windows Remote Buffer Overflow Cheatsheet
item.description: Template code Prerequisites Windows VM Immunity Debugger PATH contains C:\python27 C:\python27\Pycommands\mona.py Linux VM Kali, Parrot, custom build Both VMs need to contact each other A will to live Windows VM Launch Immunity Debugger as Administrator File > Open > vulnserver.exe Set it to run Repeat after every crash Linux VM Scan the victim IP nmap -p- <ip> Connect to the port where the app listens on

item.title: Vulnhub - Brainpan
item.description: Initial recon Nmap Host discovery Before we do any port scanning, we need to establish the exact host (Or it would take a lot longer to finish). To initiate a ping scan, we use the -sn flag. nmap -sn -oG nmap/host_discovery.txt 192.168.56.0/24 Output: <snippet> Nmap scan report for 192.168.56.104 Host is up (0.00082s latency). Service enum Now we can launch a targeted port scan nmap -sC -sV -oG nmap/service_enum.txt -v 192.

item.title: Proxmox Wake-On-LAN - alx driver patch
item.description: At home, I use my old computer as a Proxmox server. To start my server from another computer in the same LAN or from a different LAN, I use Wake-on-LAN. Unfortunately, the alx driver is disabled by default since it breaks for some kernels. The bugtrack can be found here Download the patch wget -O patch.tar.gz https://bugzilla.kernel.org/attachment.cgi?id=284877 Extract the archive mkdir ./patch tar xvzf patch.tar.gz -C ./patch Add the PVE No-Subscription repo to the apt sources and install the current kernel headers echo "deb http://download.

item.title: My ~/dotfile setup
item.description: This method involves using a Bare Git repo. You can find the dotfiles for my daily driver here Content Starting a new repo Deploying dotfiles on a new system Final script Starting a new repo Create a bare repo and an alias for git to work in that repo. Hide untracked files in config status. Put the alias in your shell config (e.g. bashrc). This way, you can use the alias when you open a new shell.

item.title: Setting up my website environment
item.description: This write-up is about how I set up my repo, travis ci and docker container to work on my portfolio. Content Kick-off Docker Hugo Linking Github Pages Conclusion Kick-off Create and open a new project folder mkdir -p ~/portfolio cd ~/portfolio Docker Install docker (refer to the Arch Wiki ¬Ø\(„ÉÑ)/¬Ø ) sudo pacman -S docker Creating docker image Alpine Linux is used as the base image FROMalpine:latestRUN apk add --no-cache \ curl \ git \ openssh-client \ rsync \ bash \ hugoENV VERSION=0.

item.title: i1Talent
item.description: DISC test The DISC model consists out of 4 temperaments(Dominance, Influence, Conscientiousness, Stability) and charts ones preferences, strong sides, communication and growth opportunities. Perks of dominance: Loving competition and challenges. Goal-oriented and craves recognition for efforts. Aiming high, wants to call the shots and is generally inventive and ingenious. Mostly independent and individualistic. Enneagram test The 2 types that stuck out the most were seller and perfectionist. According to the legend, these 2 types mean the following:
